name: ERGOMETRINE MALEATE With oxytocin
cautions:
Cautions cardiac disease; hypertension; multiple pregnancy; acute porphyria (section 9.8.2); interactions: Appendix 1
(ergot alkaloids)
doses:
Name[Syntometrine® (Alliance) ] Injection, ergometrine
maleate 500 micrograms, oxytocin 5 units/mL,
net price 1-mL amp = £1.35Dose by intramuscular injection, 1 mL; by intravenous injection, no longer recommended
